text:
Cresta | Palo Alto, CA | Full-Time | On-Site

Cresta is a seed-stage enterprise SaaS start-up augmenting repetitive mental work by building a real-time coach powered by deep learning and NLP. Although we are early, we do have product market fit and customers in the Fortune 500. Co-founders are Stanford AI Lab.

Open roles in Front End, Deep learning / NLP, and General SWE.

https://jobs.lever.co/cresta
